name: Assteroids (Gold5Games)
description:
I made this project in under 24 hours as a way to deal with my personal frustration with not being able to get even basic groceries and supplies due to people hoarding and panic shopping.

It was hacked together from the pieces of another project I have been developing.  It's rough around the edges, but fully playable.  The game defaults to the best pixel-perfect fit it can find for your monitor, but you can press the 1-9 keys (not the numpad) to change it to other settings.

The game is completely free, and donations are not expected, but any money received will definitely help as a freelancer in uncertain times, and be put toward developing bigger and better games (and buying groceries if they ever become available, haha).

PC Only.
